item.title: Project II: Filerskeepers API(confidential)
item.description: Python Data Scientist filerskeepers · Full-time Oct 2020 - Jul 2022 · 1 yr 10 months Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands\ My first data job, I was the only data Engineer in the team. I brainstormed with the CEO, and took note of two things; our available data and how we acquire them. v.1 of projectX had the following tools: Web extracting tool, collecting over ten thousand links per day. Web availability tool, running daily checks on the statuses of our live urls.
